Inputs Required: Rule#279- Detect when Alert Triggered in Sophos
Instructions: When ever alerts triggered in Sophos, it will reflect in SIEM and the rule triggers

Inputs Required: Provide the list of devices which are involved in the incident

Instructions: Cross verify if the user is VIP or not - with the list (Shared by Arcutis)
Check Sophos console and look for user associated with the device
Investigate the alert based on alert events (Ex - Sophos Services missing or Sophos Updater doesn't have Full Disk Access )
Inform IT team by raising ticket for the particular concern
If ticket raised then mention the incident number, if not mark it as false positive

Inputs Required: Track for the closer/closer confirmation from IT team
Instructions: Implement additional security measures based on the findings of the investigation and have follow up if its resolved or not
